data.message: Its me Dr slim ur #black no1 fan.hiting on u slim is just bout me not fame,we worlds apart bt i see u as part of ma fam.in my block i hv always bn ur fire shady pls be ma flame...            This life is a replica of who nd what we are tho got no prove,bt a nigga geting shot the way u play it could be a prove..he stl would hv bn dead had he a bullet prove,ur fellow Detroit nd D12 guess he's proof...i challenge u 2 rap battle slim will u chicken out?...shady am ur slim just check me out...i eat slim nd drink shady am Eminem in nd out,am a combination of Dre nd slim u see what am talking about?remember when u asked Dre to wake up i wrote  u slim,now drake is geting this fucked up whatcha think  bout him?
